poem:
Title: Conversation of War 

"Change tactics," speaks a voice from afar,
Under the guise of brotherhood or colonial avatar?
"Precise targeting," they urge, as if neat,
Blood in precision still spills onto the street.
Warlords paint their plans on Gaza's star,
Whose innocent eyes see only scar.
This is Israel's operation, they repeat,
While the world's heart skips another beat.
